author: adilabd
title: Incrypture - CIP Structured Finance
description: As new DeFi protocols sprout on Cardano, diverse solutions to similar problems will lead to incompatibilities
solution: A CIP for structured finance primitives (pooling, tranching, redirection) will help minimize incompatibilities.
experience: Incrypture is developing the Smart Structure Protocols (proposals in Boosting Defi) that will help guide the CIP for Structured Finance.
